author: James Joyce
text: Dear Mr Pinker: You may have seen a long article in the Times (Liter. Suppl. 25 July) written I believe by Mr Clutton Brock about my play Exiles. As, in the article, he calls on the Stage Society or the Pioneer Players to give it will you please send copies of this 1) one to these societies and, if you approve, also to Miss Horniman in Manchester? Sincerely yours James Joyce P.S. Has my American publisher sent the A/S of my novel for the last half year?
